required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Effect of a Diabetic- and a Kidney-like Environment on Gene and Protein Expression in Cultured EC and SMC
clinical_study.official_title: The Effect of a Diabetic- and a Kidney-like Environment on Gene and Protein Expression in Mono- and Co-cultured Endothelial and Smooth Muscle Cells

brief_summary.textblock: This research is NOT part of an interventional trial, however the investigators use umbilical cord after birth for isolating endothelial and smooth muscle cells for academic research.

detailed_description.textblock: Isolation and culturing of endothelial and smooth muscle muscles for academic research

primary_outcome.measure: The effect of a Diabetic- and a Kidney-like environment on gene and protein expression in mono- and co-cultured endothelial and smooth muscle cells

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- normal pregnancy
Exclusion Criteria:

overall_official.affiliation: Nephrology dept. Meir Medical Center, Kfar Saba , Israel

facility.name: Laboratory of Renal Physiology, Meir Medical Center ,
